typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		eReal as string,
		eRealNegative as string,
		eRealPositive as string,
		eReactiveNegative as string,
		eReactivePositive as string,
		vRMSMin as string,
		vRMSMax as string,
		iRMSMin as string,
		iRMSMax as string,
		timestamp as long,
		duration as long,
		vRMSMax1 as float,
		vRMSMax2 as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
